Inference Architecture

1. Can FPGAs Beat GPUs in Accelerating Next-Generation Deep Neural Networks

Review(Paper link)

2. Accelerating Binarized Convolutional Neural Networks with Software-Programmable FPGAs

Review(Paper link) Three major components. 1. Data, weights buffer, 2. compute units, 3. DMA system to fetch off-chip parameters. The use variable width line buffer (VWLB) to overcome input data at different bit-widths, a new input therefore can be buffered for every clock cycle. FC only perform a parallel read of inputs and weights and vector-wise parallel multiplications.

Optimizing Quantized Neural Networks on FPGAs

Review(Paper Link) Complexity analysis: conv = o(N * M * K * K * OutW * OutH) pool = o(N * OutW * OutH) conv_mem = o(N * M * K * K) Useful demo code on tiling and unrolling
